actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works ordered to be reported an original measure in lieu of s.j.res. 8.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Symms. With written report No. 99-3.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 5.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Voice Vote.
Previous action vitiated. By Unanimous Consent.
Returned to the Calendar. Calendar No. 50.

official_title: An original joint resolution to approve the Interstate Cost Estimate and the Interstate Substitute Cost Estimate, to amend title 23 , United States Code, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Approves the interstate highway cost estimate for FY 1985 and 1986 and the interstate substitute cost estimate (including substitute highway and urban mass transit projects) for FY 1984, 1985, and 1986. Directs the Secretary of Transportation to adjust and reallocate the minimum allocation made on March 9, 1984, to reflect the apportionments made under this Act. Approves the interstate highway cost estimate for FY 1987 and 1988. Revises the procedure for releasing interstate construction funds and interstate substitute funds, including allowing the Secretary to release such funds without congressional approval. Sets forth obligation limitations for Federal-aid highways and highway safety construction programs for FY 1986.

titles.title: An original joint resolution to approve the Interstate Cost Estimate and the Interstate Substitute Cost Estimate, to amend title 23 , United States Code, and for other purposes.
